summary: demelza poldark is now the proud mother to the show’s latest addition . within ten minutes of tomorrow night’s episode, fans will see aidan turner’s dashing ross poldark gaze lovingly at his new baby daughter . it is reminiscent of the show’s previous pregnancy that saw elizabeth, another contender for ross’s affection, go to full term in the gap between two episodes .
aspect: 1. Demelza Poldark is proud mother to show's latest addition. 2. Aidan Turner's Ross Poldark gazes lovingly at baby daughter. 3. Pregnancy timeline in show questionable, with blink-of-an-eye last month.
explain: 1. Demelza Poldark is the mother of the newborn baby in the show. 2. Aidan Turner's character, Ross Poldark, showers love on the baby, similar to the previous pregnancy storyline of Elizabeth. 3. Questions arise about the show's pregnancy timeline as it appears unrealistic, with a short period between episodes.
